title: AdditiveExplainer, KernelExplainer, and LinearExplainer don't support pyGAM
body:
```py
import pygam
from pygam import s

gam = pygam.GAM(s(0) + s(1) + s(2) + s(3) + s(4) + s(5))
gam.fit(X_train, y_train)
shap.AdditiveExplainer(gam, X_train)
```
```pytb
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-57-316cf15a3966> in <module>
----> 1 shap.AdditiveExplainer(gam, X_train)

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/explainers/additive.py in __init__(self, model, data, feature_perturbation)
     32             self.f = model
     33         else:
---> 34             raise ValueError("The passed model must be a recognized object or a function!")
     35 
     36         # convert dataframes

ValueError: The passed model must be a recognized object or a function!
```

```py
explainer = shap.KernelExplainer(gam, X_train)
```

```pytb
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-99-985eb316a955> in <module>
----> 1 explainer = shap.KernelExplainer(gam, X_train)

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/explainers/kernel.py in __init__(self, model, data, link, **kwargs)
     95         self.keep_index_ordered = kwargs.get("keep_index_ordered", False)
     96         self.data = convert_to_data(data, keep_index=self.keep_index)
---> 97         model_null = match_model_to_data(self.model, self.data)
     98 
     99         # enforce our current input type limitations

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/common.py in match_model_to_data(model, data)
     87             out_val = model.f(data.convert_to_df())
     88         else:
---> 89             out_val = model.f(data.data)
     90     except:
     91         print("Provided model function fails when applied to the provided data set.")

TypeError: 'GAM' object is not callable
```
```py
explainer = shap.LinearExplainer(gam, X_train)
```
```pytb
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Exception                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-119-bfd09e38d792> in <module>
----> 1 explainer = shap.LinearExplainer(gam, X_train)

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/explainers/linear.py in __init__(self, model, data, nsamples, feature_perturbation, **kwargs)
     77                 self.intercept = model.intercept_
     78         else:
---> 79             raise Exception("An unknown model type was passed: " + str(type(model)))
     80 
     81         # convert DataFrame's to numpy arrays

Exception: An unknown model type was passed: <class 'pygam.pygam.GAM'>
```
